Uses of Class
ShadowQuest.World

    • Uses of World in ShadowQuest

      Fields in ShadowQuest declared as World 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private World RPG.world 
      Methods in ShadowQuest with parameters of type World 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Player.attack(World world)
      Deal damage to every monster within range.
      void AggressiveMonster.attack(World world)
      Perform an attack on all enemy units within range
      void Player.getItem(World world)
      Pick up all the items within range of the player, and apply their effects once.
      void Player.interact(World world)
      Interact with all villagers within range of the player
      void Player.move_x(int dir, int delta, World world)
      Movement in the x direction
      void Player.move_y(int dir, int delta, World world)
      Movement in the y direction
      void Monster.moveTo(Position target, World world, boolean approach, int delta)
      Given a set distance to move per update(speed), the monster will move towards or away from a target location
      void Villager.update(double dir_x, double dir_y, double a_on, double t_on, int delta, World world)
      This update only serves to decrease the cooldown since the villager was last spoken to
      abstract void Unit.update(double dir_x, double dir_y, double a_on, double t_on, int delta, World world)
      Update method takes user input for controlling the Player character and translates this into some in-game event.
      void Player.update(double dir_x, double dir_y, double a_on, double t_on, int delta, World world)
      On update: - Check death and respawn if dead - Decrease talk and attack cooldowns, if above zero - Move player - Perform attack if relevant key is pressed - Attempt interaction if relevant key is pressed
      void PassiveMonster.update(double dir_x, double dir_y, double a_on, double t_on, int delta, World world)
      On update: - Update time since monster was last attacked - Determine whether monster is being attacked and, if it is, run away - Change direction if enough time has passed since the last change - Move in the aforementioned direction
      void AggressiveMonster.update(double dir_x, double dir_y, double a_on, double t_on, int delta, World world)
      Refer to Unit update for full details Every update, monster's cooldown decreases.
      void PassiveMonster.wander(int dir, World world, int delta)
      Move around the map in one of nine directions specified by dir
